product_name: Keen Bleecker Lace CNX Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The sleek, low-profile Keen Bleecker Lace CNX Shoes easily go from the casual workplace to a dinner date thanks to lasting comfort and classic style. Full-grain leather uppers provide durable, flexible coverage. Proprietary lightweight polyurethane midsoles and contoured arches offer long-lasting support and comfort, and allow your feet to move naturally. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide great stability. Patented Toe Guards protect feet and leather from bumps and abrasion. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Keen Bleecker Lace CNX Shoes provide great traction. Closeout.
short_description: The sleek, low-profile Keen Bleecker Lace CNX Shoes easily go from the casual workplace to a dinner date thanks to lasting comfort and classic style.
